basics.name: Sam Kay
basics.label: Mathematician, freelance musician and private tutor

education.area: In my fourth year of an integrated master's degree in mathematics with a predicted first class grade. Main pathway involves mathematical physics and fluid dynamics. Involved with the Mathematical Society. Current modules:

projects.name: The Standard Model from a Symmetry Perspective
projects.summary: Researching the construction of the standard model of particle physics via gauge theories and spontaneous symmetry breaking as part of my MMath research project.

projects.name: Chalkdust magazine
projects.summary: Writing and editing for a popular maths magazine that is distributed nationally among universities. I sometimes go by the cryptic setter name Seuss.
highlights: What's the best way to write a proof?

projects.summary: Hosting a podcast bringing light to all areas of maths with conversations among peers, PhD students and lecturers at the university. Most recent episodes:
